original_text:
But you who forsake the Lord,
    who forget my holy mountain,
who set a table for Fortune
    and fill cups of mixed wine for Destiny,
korean_text: 오직 나 여호와를 버리며 나의 성산을 잊고 갓에게 상을 베풀며 므니에게 섞은 술을 가득히 붓는 너희여

sentences.original_text: But you who forsake the Lord,
who set a table for Fortune
and fill cups of mixed wine for Destiny,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 운명에게 섞은 포도주 잔을 채우는,
